channel.title: Classicpkzz // updated // clan system // herb quest // 24/7 // thanks yong
channel.description:
LOOKING FOR EVENT STAFF AND MODS AND PMODS TO TRAIN
i give all credits to yong min for his releases and hard coding thanks yong
classicpkzz has been up for about 2 months and had 20+ people online has times
there was a wipe due to the dupe is now fixed
We have mini games and even more are being added, gambling mini game has been added. events, new NPC's, much more this is This is a 24/7 server and have put alot of time into the game. the exp rates currently at about 75x in this new server! I will post some pictures of the server below. Hope to see everyone there!
This is the classicpkzz, This server is hosted on a Dedicated Server. We guarantee you will like it. This source is based on easyrsc atm. its Sure free for all ( no donations only if u want to i am not going to ask ) its a long term server so its not waste of your time !:) And since we are still a bit new, it isn't that hard to work your way on up to the #1 overall rank! classicpkzz is a small community with a great server & still growing in activity. Drop rates for meds/sqs are decent - no more fucked economy. Rune is fairly easy, however.
Usernames with spaces Fixed Zoom in and Out - Page Up/Down Buttons Client Information - Toggles with F6 New rank and crown color for Event Staff Quest Points Kills and Deaths Counter Sleeping Bag Method ::say History Clan System New Color Grey - @gry@ <message> Adverts Updated Herblaw Quest - Required to start using the herblaw skill and gives 2 Quest Points Apothecary Added Klank and shield exchange slightly re-coded to work more Efficiently Player Info turned into a commands List Added fatigue warning Messages - starts at 90% Fatigue Some commands re-coded to work more Efficiently
Normal User Commands -------------------- ::stuck ::skull ::onlinelist ::online ::say <message> ::fatigue
Clan System Commands -------------------- ::c <message> // This sends a message to the whole clan. ::go // This command is used when you're summoned by the clan leader. ::leave // This command is used to leave the current clan you're in. ::invite <username> // This command is used to invite another player into your clan. ::accept // This command is used to accept the clan invitation. ::summonparty // This command is used to summon everyone who is in the clan. ::clan // This will show the names of the people who are currently in the clan. ::array // This command is also used to show the names of the people who are in the clan.
WILL ADD PIC TOMORROW IM TIRED GOING TO BED
everything in my sig

item.description:
@_A_mpd wrote:

Multiple accounts, eh? Is your server such fail, bamboozola, that you have to go on your other account, slippinslide (which you created to evade a mute, I should add), and pretend that it’s a great server? That’s pretty hilarious, if you ask me.

Also, before you say “wtf r u talkin about, im not bamboozola”, read this- your MSN address, as shown on your profile (slippin2009@live.com), is the same address that was used to register your other account, bamboozola.

And of course, I must say- LOL OWNED!

Are you kidding? Ask bungle, he was right there, your fucking douche bag buddy ‘Poland’ was spamming constantly about reaching the maximum level, which to be honest on your server a kid with autism could reach in about a day. That kid always spams, when he says or asks something in ::say and no one responds, he spams it for a good minute before I tell him to shut the fuck up because no one wants to see his annoying spam. Then your friend ‘Raheem’ was spamming that ‘the admin is right next to me, ill go get him!’ to get me banned for what, stopping spam and in a way helping your piece of shit server?

Horrible admin on your part, Lrn2getPmods, and stop failing.[/quote]
well thank you
